title: Validate Tags on Games Page
custom_preconds:
1. Already logged into the App.
2. App env is set to QA and Wiremock is on.
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Games Page.
2. Kick off your automated script and let it verify all the tags on the page.
Tags to verify: Apple, YouTube, Warmup, Live, Blackout, Audio Available, Peacock, MLB Free Game of the Day, Blackout, Inclement Weather, Suspended, Postponed, Delayed.
custom_expected:
When the Wiremock service is set to ON.
Upon restart of the app, you will see that date is automatically set to Wednesday, July 20.
All the Tags need to be present
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13412557)

title: Validate Audio Account
custom_preconds: 1. Sign into the app with an audio account.
custom_steps: 1. Navigate to the Games Page and click on the game tile.
custom_expected:
Upon clicking on the game tile the model should show you two options:
1. Audio feed.
2. Upgrade MLB.TV
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13412554)

title: Validate Hide Spoilers
custom_preconds: Sign into the app with a valid account. (tvyearly or audioyearly).
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to Settings
2. Turn Hide Spoiler ON
3. Navigate to the Games or to the Clips Page
custom_expected:
You will see appropriate messaging. Depends on what page you are on Games or the Clips.
On the Clips and Games Page, you will see this. Respectively  
Clips Page
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13412555)
Games Page
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13412556)

title: Onboarding Buttons are present on the screen - Have an MLB account
custom_preconds:
1. You have the app installed.
2. You have valid credentials.
custom_steps:
1. Launch the App, and you will see the Welcome screen.
2. Click on the second button, "Have an MLB account"
3. You'll be asked to enter your credentials.
4. Upon entering those credentials, it'll take you directly to the App Home Page.
5. Here, we can verify that the Login button isn't available in the navbar (once you are logged in).

title: Onboarding Buttons are present on the screen - Get Started
custom_preconds:
1. You have the app installed 
2. You are signing up for the first time.
custom_steps:
1. Launch the app, and you'll see the "Get Started" button.
2. Click on the "Get Started" button.
3. Pick a Team and click on the "Next" button.
4. Click on "Create Free Account."
5. Enter Credentials for your free account and click on Create Account.
6. Click Continue to "Your account was successfully created."
custom_expected:
Get Started button
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13414462)

Next button
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13414463)

Create Free Account
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13414464)

Enter Credentials
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13414467)

Click Continue
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13414468)

title: Login/ Logout Model
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to Settings.
2. Verify the Login Button text.
3. Click on the Login Button text.
4. Verify the Text on the screen. i.e All the texts including Email Address, Password, login and cancel button.

title: Favorite Team
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Settings Page.
2. Select the "Favorite Team" and verify the Element as well as the text that goes with it (on the left side of the screen).
3. Click on Favorite Team and Verify the team names and the text on the screen for the American and National League.

title: Followed Teams
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Settings Page.
2. Select the "Followed Team" and verify the Element as well as the text that goes with it (on the left side of the screen).
3. Click on Followed Teams and Verify the team names and the text on the screen for the American and National League.

title: Hide Spoilers
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Settings screen.
2. Select "Hide Spoilers"
3. Verify the text "Hide Spoilers On" or "Off" and the description on the left side of the screen. See attached.

**NOTE**: This might a little challenging given that we have **two** On and Off text on the screen on the settings page. One for Hide Spoilers and one for Autoplay Featured Content.

title: Autoplay Featured Content
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Settings screen.
2. Select "Autoplay Featured Content"
3. Verify the text "Autoplay Featured Content" or "Off" and the description on the left side of the screen. See attached.
**NOTE**: This might a little challenging given that we have **two** On and Off text on the screen on the settings page. One for Hide Spoilers and one for Autoplay Featured Content.

title: Get Mlb.TV
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Settings screen.
2. Select "Get MLB.TV"
3. Verify the text "Get MLB.TV" text.
4. Click on the "Get MLB.TV" button. It'll open up a new Page where you will see the Three button (see next step).
5. "Create Free Account", "Browse Subscriptions", and "Explore Free Content".

title: Select App Start View
custom_steps:
1. Go to the Settings Page.
2. Select "Select App Start View"
3. Verify the text on the screen on "Select App Stat View".
4. Restart the App and you should see that app has launched on the Home Screen.
5. Navigate back to the Settings Page and set the "Select App Start View" to Games.
6. Re-launch the app and you should see that app has now launched and it launched to the Games Page.

title: Terms of Service
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Settings page.
2. Navigate down to the "Terms of Service"
3. On the left side you will see the terms. Very that text.

title: Contact MLB Support
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Settings page.
2. Navigate down to the "Contact MLB Support"
3. On the left side you will see the terms. Verify that text.

title: Verify the Top Navigation Bar
custom_steps:
1. Launch the App.
2. Verify the UI elements. i.e
**Home** | **Games** | **Clips** | **Shows** | **MLB Network** | **Login** | **Get MLB.TV** | **Settings**

title: Verify the Login button from the Navigation bar
custom_preconds:
1. You have the App installed.
2. Launch the App.
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to Login from the top navigation.
2. Click on the Login Button.

title: Verify the Get MLB.TV button
custom_preconds:
1. You have the app installed on your platform.
2. You are not signed in.
custom_steps:
1. Launch the App
2. See the top nav bar; you should see the Get MLB.TV button on the right side of the page.

title: Verify Upgrade MLB.TV button
custom_steps:
1. Sign into the app with a free account.
2. Once you sign in, you'll see the Upgrade MLB.TV button on the right side of the app.

title: Verify navigation buttons
custom_steps:
1. Launch the app and navigate to the Games Page.
2. On the top right, you should see the navigation buttons underneath the navigation bar. Taking you to the previous and the next day.
3. Upon pressing those buttons, the games page should take you to the previous and the next day.

title: Verify the Calendar button
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Games Page.
2. Under the navigation bar on the top right side, you should see a calendar button.
3. By pressing on that button, it should take you to the calendar view.

title: Verify the Today button
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Games Page.
2. Click on the calendar button.
3. You will enter the calendar button, and on the top right, you will see the "Today" button.
custom_expected: Vikram to attached a screenshot of the Today button. Currently, it isn't available. It'll be available on Feb 24

title: Verify the navigation button inside the calendar
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Games page.
2. Click on the calendar button. It'll take you inside the calendar view.
3. Click on the navigation button for the previous and the next day.

title: MLB Network with valid/ authorized credentials
custom_preconds:
1. You have the app installed.
2. You are logged in with the proper credentials, which have access to watch the MLB Network.
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to MLB Network from the top navigation bar.
2 Click on the MLB Network, and you should see two things:
**Watch Live** button and **Today on MLB Network**

title: MLB Network without valid/ authorized credentials
custom_preconds:
1. You have the app installed.
2. You are not logged in.
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the MLB Network page.
2. Click on the MLB Network page and you'll see:
**MLB Network requires a MLB.tv account and a pay TV subscription.**
